Thus have I heard.
Once, the World-Honored One was in the middle of the Heaven of the Thirty-three, under the pÄrijÄta tree.
At that time, the Heavenly King Åšakra
and all the heavenly beings and troops,
surrounding him in front and back, came to where the Buddha was.
Each and every one sincerely joined palms in reverence.
Gazing up at the TathÄgata, they stayed in their places in order.
At that time, the Heavenly King Åšakra addressed the Buddha, saying:
World-Honored One, I have a dhÄraá¹‡Ä« called the Thousand-Revolved Great Illumination.
This dhÄraá¹‡Ä«, in all worlds,
is of great benefit.
All the devas, nÄgas, yaká¹£as, hungry ghosts, kumbhÄá¹‡á¸as, and so forth, up to humans and non-humans,

will all be subdued, and toward all beings,
All unfavorable events will be completely eliminated.
I only pray that the World-Honored One, out of great kindness and compassion, will allow me to proclaim it.
The Buddha said, Lord of the Heaven, excellent, excellent!
As you have said, the great thousand transformations great bright dharani
Can bring great benefit to the world.
If you wish to speak it, you should do so according to your intention.
At that time, the Lord of the Heaven of the Thirty-three
Then spoke the thousand transformations great bright dharani, saying:
Tadyatha. Nashi tashivadi. Bhagavat. Bhagavat. Sanat. Kumara. All the bhutas hear what is said.
They will be frightened, confused, crazed, and scatter.
The yaksha lord Ratnasambhava and those who accomplish the wheel will manifest various forms.
They will cause the bhutas, ghosts, and spirits, as well as those who wander in the sky, zombies, and evil ghosts with malaria,
Up to all those who practice the poisonous fundamental wrong teachings.
All harmful and injurious matters that do not benefit sentient beings,
Are completely liberated.ğŸ”½Annapati Upannapati Anga-kariğŸ”½Arini SvahağŸ”½Namas to the Buddha, Namas to the Dharma, NamasğŸ”½To the Sangha, Namas to Avalokiteshvara,

Liberation from all fears.
Liberation from the fear of all strange phenomena of stars and planets.
Liberation from the fear of battles with one's own and others' armies.
Liberation from the fear of all weapons.
Liberation from the fear of drowning in water or being burned by fire.ğŸ”½Liberation from the fear of all evil illnesses and afflictions.
Liberation from the fear of all poisonous and harmful injuries.ğŸ”½Fear of lions, fear of elephants,
Fear of bears, fear of tigers,
Fear of all evil beasts,
Fear of being stranded in the great ocean, fear of the desolate silence of the deep mountains,
Up to the fear of the difficulties of the water rapids.
One will be liberated from all such fears.
When entering the royal palace, seeing ministers,
When marching in the army, encountering enemies,ğŸ”½When seeing poisonous snakes, poisonous dragons,
When encountering yakshas, pishachas, rakshasas, and those possessed by upasmaras,
Up to mountains, seas, and dangerous places,
In such fears, one will be completely liberated.ğŸ”½Namo taraya bhagavati shravani he le he le je le je le ka pa le ma deng ni svaha
Moreover, when seized by the king's law, or when the body is bound by shackles, chains, and handcuffs,
One will be completely liberated from all unjust and oppressive sufferings.

Harassing sentient beings during the day and night.
Causing sentient beings to experience various kinds of suffering and distress.
World-Honored One, if there are sentient beings
Who encounter these evil ghosts and experience various kinds of harassment and suffering,
Up to all that is undesirable in the world,
They should take seven handfuls of soil from a pure place.
Recite and empower this great mantra seven times for each handful.
Mix it to make seven pills and tie them to the corner of their clothes.
It will cause all the evil ghosts and spirits that bring harm
To dare not approach, to be terrified and to scatter in retreat.
It will cause this person to be at ease day and night.
All inauspicious things will be completely eliminated.
At that time, the Lord of the Heaven of the Thirty-three Celestials, having spoken this Thousand Transformations Great Mantra DhÄraá¹‡Ä«,
Rejoiced and, together with the celestial beings, bowed to the Buddha and withdrew.
